mapper.select: select type_id, type_name, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from trademark.tbl_dictionary_type where type_id = #{typeId}
select type_id, type_name, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from trademark.tbl_dictionary_type limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select count(*) count from trademark.tbl_dictionary_type
and type_id = #{typeId}
and type_name like "%"#{typeName}"%"
and create_by like "%"#{createBy}"%"
mapper.insert: insert into trademark.tbl_dictionary_type(type_name, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values (#{typeName}, #{createBy}, now(), #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{remark})

insert into trademark.tbl_dictionary_type(type_name, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values
(#{entity.typeName}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remark})

insert into trademark.tbl_dictionary_type(type_name, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values
(#{entity.typeName}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remark})
on duplicate key update type_name = values(type_name) , create_by = values(create_by) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_by = values(update_by) , update_time = values(update_time) , remark = values(remark)
mapper.update:
update trademark.tbl_dictionary_type
type_name = #{typeName},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
remark = #{remark},
update_time = now(),
where type_id = #{typeId}
